name: Digital-hill
tagline: A digital editon of G.F. Hill, Sources for Greek History between the Persian and Peloponnesian Wars, Oxford 1897.
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.

A digital editon of [G.F. Hill, _Sources for Greek History between the Persian and Peloponnesian Wars_, Oxford 1897](https://archive.org/details/sourcesforgreekh00hilluoft).

Text is encoded in accordance with the latest EpiDoc standards and includes Perseus Catalog URIs of author and text (where available).

* [EpiDoc files](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/Digital-Hill/tree/master/EpiDoc%20files)
* [Bare XML files](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/Digital-Hill/tree/master/bare%20XML%20)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
